attributes.action: stop tottenham Hotspur from receiving a local governmen grant or any other type of government grant to rebuild their ground
attributes.additional_details: I don't think that Tottenham Hotspur should allowed to receive any kind of government grant to rebuild their ground. My reason for this is that when West Ham United where originally chosen as the preferred owner they complained about Newham Council giving them a loan as part of their plan to rebuild the stadium for them to move in, What is the difference between the deal with the Mayor of London they appear to be getting and the deal West Ham had with Newham Council?
